price: Он је човек опседнут духовима, па пустите га неко време!”
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīnin
